verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> <S%G1223>after<s%> the space of <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, <S%G4838>taking<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> with <S%G4838>me<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G394>laid<s%> before <S%G846>them<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2596>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2398>privately<s%> before them <S%G3588>who<s%> were of <S%G1380>repute<s%>, lest by any <S%G3381>means<s%> I should be <S%G5143>running<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> had <S%G5143>run<s%>, <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> who <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1672>Greek<s%>, was <S%G315>compelled<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>:

and <S%G1161>that<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> the false <S%G5569>brethren<s%> privily brought <S%G3920>in<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> came in <S%G3922>privily<s%> to spy <S%G2684>out<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2615>bring<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> into <S%G2615>bondage<s%>:

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> we gave <S%G1502>place<s%> in the way of <S%G5292>subjection<s%>, <S%G3761>no<s%>, not <S%G4314>for<s%> an <S%G5610>hour<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> might <S%G1265>continue<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1380>were<s%> reputed to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> (whatsoever3697, 4218 they <S%G2258>were<s%>, it <S%G1308>maketh<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G1308>matter<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>: <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2983>accepteth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G4383>person<s%>) <S%G1063><s%> â€”they, I <S%G3588>say<s%>, who <S%G1380>were<s%> of repute <S%G4323>imparted<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%>, when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I had been <S%G4100>intrusted<s%> with the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> with the gospel of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G1754>wrought<s%> for <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G651>apostleship<s%> of the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1754>wrought<s%> for <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>);

and <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1097>perceived<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G2532>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%>, they <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G1380>reputed<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4769>pillars<s%>, <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> the right <S%G1188>hands<s%> of <S%G2842>fellowship<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> should go <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>;

only <S%G3440><s%> they would <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%>; <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5124>thing<s%> I was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4704>zealous<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G4074>Cephas<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, I <S%G436>resisted<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2258>stood<s%> <S%G2607>condemned<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%>, he <S%G4906>ate<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%>, he drew <S%G5288>back<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G5399>fearing<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> were <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4942>dissembled<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> with <S%G846>him<s%>; insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> was carried away <S%G4879>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5272>dissimulation<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3716>walked<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3716>uprightly<s%> according <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, I <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4074>Cephas<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%>, <S%G5225>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2198>livest<s%> as do the <S%G1483>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> as do the <S%G2452>Jews<s%>, <S%G5101>how<s%> compellest <S%G315>thou<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> to live as do the <S%G2450>Jews<s%>?
We <S%G2249><s%> being <S%G2453>Jews<s%> by <S%G5449>nature<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>,

yet <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1344>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> but1437, 3361 <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>: because <S%G1360>by<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1344>shall<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%>, while we <S%G2212>sought<s%> to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, we <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%>, <S%G687>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G3361>sin<s%>? God <S%G1096>forbid<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3618>build<s%> up <S%G3825>again<s%> those <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2647>destroyed<s%>, I <S%G4921>prove<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> unto the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>.

I have been crucified <S%G4957>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> it is <S%G3765>no<s%> longer <S%G1473>I<s%> that <S%G2198>live<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> that life <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2198>I<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, the faith which is in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> up <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

I <S%G114>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> make <S%G114>void<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for <S%G1432>nought<s%>.
